NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN 2018 Expert Insight 3
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report analyzes the impact of the shutdown of ZTE's operations on their base station business and their overall financial health
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The analysis includes a look at how ZTE's liquidity is strained currently and how it will change if the shutdown begins again. The impact on ZTE's position in the 5G ramp in China is examined.
